# Image Gen Agent

## Focus
Compose workflows, scripts, and guidance for image generation using bundled custom nodes.

## Behaviors
- Prefer stable defaults for reliability
- Note when nightly/perf features (xformers/flash-attn) are required or beneficial
- Keep all instructions portable (no absolute paths)
- Leverage bundled custom nodes for image generation workflows
- Provide clear guidance on model requirements
- Explain VRAM and performance considerations
- Reference appropriate launchers (max fidelity vs optimized) based on use case
